title: EU provides grants for small tourism businesses
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The European Union has decided to provide grants to support small tourism businesses.

Accordingly, the European Union in Sri Lanka and the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority (SLTDA) has taken the initiative to provide 60 million rupees in grants to support small tourism businesses.
The first three companies received their grants earlier this week under the EU-funded tourism resilience project.
